Posts.Content: Hi yes my cancer was in the nipple and nodes .I found a little lump in my nipple 7 weeks ago not thinking it cancer but if not for that little lump i would not have gone to my doctor as didnt realise that my lymph nodes had it so goes to show any breast lump should be checked out xx
Posts.Title: Still worried about future

Posts.Content: Hello all Had my surgery on the 6th and a week on feel worse than I did post op. Saying this my drain is still in until its 40m 2 days on run .I had my nipple removed and full node clearance on right side .Trust me to have trouble with dressings as developed blisters under my arm near drain. Next Tuesday I see the consultant for my results hoping I won't have to have any more removed from breast but if so ,so be it I am worried I have to be honest and wonder if anyone like me that can give me rearssures .
Posts.Title: Still worried about future

Posts.Content: Hi Ann ,I hope your feeling better now after your second operation . I am seeing surgeon next Tue so hoping for good news . You are so right about the drain it makes me sick looking at it so hope its not many days left in . Having full node clearerence was a shock so be glad when I can do all the exercises so my arm don't go stiff. Feeling so tired at moment but can't sleep ,maybe after seeing surgeon I will as at moment scared they didn't get it all .Take care hope you get stronger as time goes on ccx
Posts.Title: Still worried about future

Posts.Content: Hello all Had my surgery on the 6th and a week on feel worse than I did post op. Saying this my drain is still in until its 40m 2 days on run .I had my nipple removed and full node clearance on right side .Trust me to have trouble with dressings as developed blisters under my arm near drain. Next Tuesday I see the consultant for my results hoping I won't have to have any more removed from breast but if so ,so be it I am worried I have to be honest and wonder if anyone like me that can give me rearssures .
Posts.Title: Still worried about future

Posts.Content: Thank you so much I will keep up with exercises and wait for drain to come out till I do others  Wishing you well in whatever you do xcx
Posts.Title: Still worried about future

Posts.Content: Hi yes my cancer was in the nipple and nodes .I found a little lump in my nipple 7 weeks ago not thinking it cancer but if not for that little lump i would not have gone to my doctor as didnt realise that my lymph nodes had it so goes to show any breast lump should be checked out xx
Posts.Title: Still worried about future

Posts.Content: Hi lovely. I like most on here know how you feel as we been there.Just take one day at a time otherwise there be 2 much going through your mind .This group is wonderful and always someone here to talk to day and night .I was chatting on here at 4 am so you can see always someone here. Your going through a awful time and waiting is the worse as once you know you can say right i have to do this and that Come on here as often as you like to vent your feeling as always someone here .Take care lovely soon you will know where you are with this horrid illness xxxx
Posts.Title: Awaiting breast biopsy results feel like I'm going mad

Posts.Content: Thank you so much I will keep up with exercises and wait for drain to come out till I do others  Wishing you well in whatever you do xcx
Posts.Title: Still worried about future

Posts.Content: Hi Ann ,I hope your feeling better now after your second operation . I am seeing surgeon next Tue so hoping for good news . You are so right about the drain it makes me sick looking at it so hope its not many days left in . Having full node clearerence was a shock so be glad when I can do all the exercises so my arm don't go stiff. Feeling so tired at moment but can't sleep ,maybe after seeing surgeon I will as at moment scared they didn't get it all .Take care hope you get stronger as time goes on ccx
Posts.Title: Still worried about future

Posts.Content: Oh Angela you poor love ,what a terrible thing to happen to you . I'm fairly new to this site and not really up on things like a lot of the ladies here so sure someone will soon give you advice . My way would be if you are going to wait until morning give your BCN a ring for advice as my breast was sore when I saw oncologist a fortnight ago and he told me no radiotherapy till I was less sore . If your really unwell go to A&E tonight but looking at time and knowing how long the wait it could be morning before your seen .Sorry I'm not more helpful but wanted to answer you as you must be so sore. Please let us know what happens Take care and gentle hugs as your sore Fran xxxx
Posts.Title: Car crash just before radiation due to start

Posts.Content: Hi I am on gabapentin for nerve pain and Tramodol for other pain . I was on these before I had cancer as had 2 spine operations. If I stop taken these I get terrible back spasms to a point I can't sit on the toilet or in a chair just cry out in pain till it passes so must take them . They do not help with my joint paint from the Letrozol but don't think my doc will give me anything else. This week they changed me off letrozole to another called Exemastas I think that's how's it spelt as not by me lol .Anyway I'm hoping these will help my joint pain as start Radiotherapy February 5th xxxxFran
Posts.Title: Peripheral neuropathy joint pains and letrozole

Posts.Content: Great your feeling good but like others said take your time as you dont want to go backwards .Sending a gentle hug  xxxxxFran
Posts.Title: Had my op

Posts.Content: Thank you Lynn I will bre starting Letrazole from tomorrow . I am making a note tro take them as soon as I wake every morning as hope by bed time some of the effects will wear off but time will tell .Thank you for advice to look for threads xxx
Posts.Title: My results so pleased

Posts.Content: Hi all today I had my results and good news they removed all the cancer. Next step is radiotherapy and will wait for oncology to send for me as to have 15 sessions over 3 weeks .Also must keep up my exercise so I don't get lymphodema in my arm . I been put on a drug for life called Letrazole that has side effects like going through the change so wondered if anyone is taken it and effect . Thank you for support over a awful time and hope I can help someone xx
Posts.Title: My results so pleased

Posts.Content: Thank you and yes celebration meal with family when I feel stronger xx
Posts.Title: My results so pleased

Posts.Content: Yaaaa great your answer put my mind at ease and no that onco type not mentioned so all looking positive for me and lucky up to now letrozole having no side effects unless its given me insomnia lol but no aches Fran xxx
Posts.Title: ONLINE PARTY......

Posts.Content: Nighty night.   Xx did
Posts.Title: ONLINE PARTY......

Posts.Content: Hi LL thanks lovely will try in morning when my brain isn't in sleep mode .Have you managed a sleep yet I must try orbit will catch up on me but once again brain working overtime .Spoke to my oncologist this week and he told me they removed 16 lymph nodes and a lot of breast but not all and did have clear margins. With removing so many lymph nodes although very glad I don't have to have chemo but see on here some only had a few removed but have to have chemo .I'm having radiotherapy in February so know what they doing but praying cancer won't come back after having so much of breast removed as tumour was in nipple and so many lymph nodes. This is why I can't sleep mind working overtime Fran xxxxx
Posts.Title: ONLINE PARTY......

Posts.Content: Hi L L from what I see on my results form 1 had cancer one was micro met others seemed clear 2 tumours in breast one was 15 mm other 25 mm also oestrogens positive and prostogene think that's how its spelt lol both positive that's now why I'm on loprozole HER negative xxx
Posts.Title: ONLINE PARTY......

Posts.Content: I'm happy no chemo can handle radiotherapy easy but just wondered why. God I'm a silly woman I should be happy but these silly niggles in back of my mind so going to have  ball tomorrow in party .Going to wear my little black number not worm in ages lol Fran xxx
Posts.Title: ONLINE PARTY......

Posts.Content: Mega excited now a party jut what I need.Can anyone tell me how do I do pictures Thanks ,Fran xxx
Posts.Title: ONLINE PARTY......

Posts.Content: Hi ladies love this thread and tomorrow going to take my overweight bichon for a walk as not been able to take her. Will go everyday this week and report my progress and take some pics. Hope I will be OK after radiotherapy next week but if not 3 weeks will pass fast and back to Walking back to happiness again .Go go go ladies we can do it xxxxFran
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: Hi all I did manage to take Zoe for a walk after hubby went to dialysis and felt guilty the other two looking at me through window but can only manage one at a time with my arm still not right. Well we managed 30 minutes out got home to a lovely warm house and Zoe zonked out and I wasn't far behind her and slept 2 hours .  Tomorrow I will stay awake as must xxxxFran
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: Hi lovely ladies . Not done walking this week as on radiotherapy and out of house 5 hours as travelling taking a lot of time but will be back at it Saturday love the pics love to all xxxxFran
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: Hi all thank you for replying . I was very active before my op as looked and still do after my hubby who has end stage renal failure and on dialysis 3 times a week . I have never been a weak person so this hit me like a ton of bricks . I agree that we all heal at different paces but thought I was taken to long . I spoke to my BCN today and she thinks my nerves are coming back to life and that's causing me pain .I know I must think more positive and sure I will just get these moments where I don't feel in control any more. Hope you all have a great sleep tonight and stay warm . I'm cuddled up to 2 of my 3 bichons and again thank you lovely ladies xxxxFran
Posts.Title: Having a bit of a melt down

Posts.Content: Hi all not posted for a few days as been having a I feel sorry for me time. I really thought I would be tip top by now how wrong was I as my bap been sore hard to have it drained last week while having ultrasound scan and been put on 2 lots of antibiotics. The oncologist won't do anything in regards to my radiotherapy till I have healed more but its close to 6weeks since my op I had my nipple removed and good part of bap and 15 lymph nodes that seems to be healing well as do my exercises 3 times a day . My daughter is my main support and tells me its not a race and I will get better but don't feel like that at present . Have any of you felt like this or do I need a kick up the back side to get me going .Also so tired all the time xx Fran
Posts.Title: Having a bit of a melt down

Posts.Content: Hi all ,I had full node clearence in November and a WLE and after a few weeks was put on letrozole but after a few weeks on them my joint just about siezed up .I rung my BCN as was worried about lifting my arm for Radiotherepy and was given a appointment with my breast surgeon.At first she thought i already had my Rads as told me homone tablets usually follow radiotherepy but she wanted me still to take something so was changed to Exemestane, I have been taking these for just over a week and have to say my joints are more flexable but omg i cant stop going to the toilet and blinding headaches so thinking of not taking nothing as at moment i have no quality of life.Im just sitting at home waiting for next run to toilet  .Has anyone stopped taking Homone Therepy and are they better for it as i want quality not quanity .Thanks all xxxxxxFran
Posts.Title: Stopping homone therepy

Posts.Content: Hi and thank you for your reply . It was not discussed either way with my oncologist so don't know , just know I feel so much better after just 2 days of not taking them as I'm my Hubby's carer I just can't be feeling like I have been . xxxxFran
Posts.Title: Stopping homone therepy

Posts.Content: Hi all and thank you for replies .I rung my BCN today and she said to get my radiotherapy out the way then she will make a appointment with my oncologist to come up with a solution so feel better about this as think one thing at a time and start radiotherapy February 5th so not long .Take care all xxxxFran
Posts.Title: Stopping homone therepy

Posts.Content: Forgot to mention starting R/t Febuary 5th
Posts.Title: Stopping homone therepy

Posts.Content: Day 1 done and treatment not as bad as I feared was just the walking in for the first time . The staff were brilliant and gave me a tabbard to wear until treatment finishes so can wear it under a jumper so won't have to get undressed every time . Started chatting to a few ladies so although out of house a long time made time go faster . Good luck all on RT this week xxxxFran
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi all sorry I haven't been on line to let you all know how my radiotherapy been going but had a other part of my life to deal with as hubby been very poorly so been coming home from treatment seeing into him and falling into bed shattered. I finished my radiotherapy yesterday and happy its all over as the journey back and for was the worst part of treatment as out of house 5 plus hours . I'm a little sore but that will clear up soon . I also saw my oncologist who has taken me off Letrozol and am now on tamoxofen so hope I won't have so many aches on them .I met some lovely people there who I will keep in touch with.It really wasn't as bad as I thought as if hubby hadn't been I'll and I lived nearer hospital I would have sailed through it. Hope your all near the end of your treatment .ones who have finished well done and ones near end it is all worth it Fran xxxxx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi all we must think this as zap the bap month as I had full node clearance and WLE and honest mine really looks like a bread bap that reason me calling it zap the bap . Hope you all have easy time well as easy as it can be and let us know how your doing after first week .love to all xxxxFran
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Thank you Lynn ,I start radiotherapy on Monday but only in stimulator Monday Tuesday is beginning of Zap the bap day .Got everything in place my R1 and R2 creams Aleovera Alvenno so lots to stop me having problems but think R1 and 2 will be enough . Going to be a hard 3 weeks with seeing to hubby so when over I will be ringing the bell like a dormented idiot .Good luck to you all we will do this together xxxxFran
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: First week over with so got weekend to do some catching up .It all went OK and with the R1 and R2 creams no soreness .The travelling only bugbare as out of house a good few hours and find once there a good 90 min wait but then its only 3 weeks and will soon go .Have a nice weekend away from it all xxxxFran
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Thank you so very much .Thats all thats keeping me going now is that a week today the operation will be behind me .I do have a lovely family but i have always been the strong one and feel like this is happening but to someone else and im just looking in .It is such a odd feeling xx
Posts.Title: Feeling alone

Posts.Content: I have it in my right breast as thought it was a cysyt at first as was on my nipple so was sent for a mammogram 3 weeks ago then had to have biopsy under my arm and also a needle one in my breast and that was so painful .The result came back that i had cancer in right breast and also in lymph nodes.They have been very quick with me as have my operation on this coming Monday .I do know the nodes will be removed as told i will have a drain in and also removing front of my breast .Also been told i will need raidiotherpy  after .Since i been told its been back and from hospital to see my breast care nurse and she is wonderful so is my consultant .She is a person you can talk to.I am just trying so hard to keep it all together for my husband as he does dialysis 3 times a week in the renal unit .I am so glad i found this place so i can chat to people who been through it x
Posts.Title: Feeling alone

Posts.Content: Having mine at same place Neath and Port Talbot they are brilliant there and the breast care nurses are great and caring .Won't know where I will have rad yet but could be Singleton as I'm West Wales x
Posts.Title: Feeling alone

Posts.Content: Both of us next Monday .Good luck soon be over for us x
Posts.Title: Feeling alone

Posts.Content: I am trying so hard to be brave since i found out i have breast cancer as have my husband on dialysis 3 times a week and he needs me to be upbeat but inside i am terrified at what lies ahead
Posts.Title: Feeling alone

Posts.Content: Im in South Wales had my pre op done a week ago and having my op done this Monday 6th .Will be glad when its over and  so will you x
Posts.Title: Feeling alone

Posts.Content: Hi all ,The BCN rung me this morning at 8.30 bless her i must have been first on answer phone.She went to look for app to see onco and its next Tuesday the 16th .I must keep taking the Letrazole until i go down as BCN said they will see about changing them .After a lovely hair do yesterday it is now flat to my head and looks like its just been washed but can cope in someway but this aching i cant as have other health issues and also carer for hubby who is in end stage renal failure and on dialysis .Hope you all have a good day Hugs all around to each and every one of you .Fran xxxx
Posts.Title: Sweats awful

Posts.Content: Still waiting to hear from BCN about the terrible aches and stiffness but now having terrible Sweats.  Today I had a perm what a waste of time as within hour of blow drying it went flat to my head all all curled. Not to awful when you take into account what we are going through  but these Letrozole are awful I can't stick this aching joints on top of my other problems so seriously thinking of stopping them .Any feedback back I would be grateful hugs to all xxxxFran
Posts.Title: Sweats awful

Posts.Content: Thank you LL and yes im post menopausal .I think my BCN will ring tomorrow but if not by afternoon will go to my GP who are wonderful all of them in that surgery and sure they will help me .Even finding it hard to type but was so upset about my hair which really shouldnt bother me but has as cost £60 and my hair is everything lol as long as its nice i feel ok .I will have to sort this out soon as at moment sitting with fan going beside me and same in bed on top of covers with it on This BC is horrid and all other cancers and when people say Oh breast cancer its so treatable .I blooming know that but people dont know how hard it is with side affects od medication we have to endure .Rant over hope your ok LL as i know your having a lot of issues yourself so a huge hug from me .Fran xxx
Posts.Title: Sweats awful
